history.text: Hi
What movie did we get
Hi.  We got Home Alone.
Oh ok
So who plays in home alone
Macauley Culkin as Kevin.  Jo Pesci as Harry. Daniel Stern as Marv.  John Heard as Peter, and Roberts Blossom as Marley
You should see this movie because it has pretty good critic reviews
Wow got some pretty good actors in this movie
So tell me something about the movie
It's ranked on Rotten Tomatoes as a 62%. 63 on Metacritic and an A on CinemaScore
Yeah what’s the highest review
It was made in 1990, and is a comedy film.  John Hughes wrote and produced it, and Chris Columbus directed it.
That’s pretty good not great but descent
I like comedy’s so I may like this movie
The McCallister family is getting ready to leave the country for Christmas
What’s the plot of the movie
Kevin gets mad at his family after getting into a fight with his brother and cousins.  He is sent to a room on the 3rd floor as punishment.
While there, he wishes for his family to disappear.

During the night a windstorm causes a power outage, the family is late getting to the airport and Kevin is accidentally left behind
.
Wow how do you forget your kid
So I’m guess this the title home alone
Kate (the mom) realizes mid-flight to Paris that they left Kevin at home
ha, yes.
Once they get to Paris, they realizes that all flights back are booked for 2 days.
So what happens while there gone
Actually she gets to Scranton, PA and then gets stuck.  A man named Gus is traveling with his band and overhears her, and offers to give her a ride to Chicago.
Oh ok a Good Samaritan
So what happens with the kid while there gone
So, Kevin enjoys being home alone in the beginning, until he realizes two burglars are planning on robbing his house.
Oh no trouble
So, he rigs his whole house with booby traps.  Harry and Marv break in and spring the booby traps, and continuously get injured.
It is full of slap stick comedy.
While they are chasing him, he flees his house and calls the police
They catch him and are about to harm him, but Marley sneaks in and hits them over the head with a snow shovel
I bet it sounds funny a kid fighting   burglars with booby traps
the police arrive
On Christmas day, Kevin wakes up and now is sad that his family is still gone.  But then! he hears his mom enter the house
They are then joined by the rest of the family.
Kevin doesn't tell them about the burglars.  Kevin sees Marley reuniting with his family and waves to him
Buzz goes to his room and yells out to Kevin asking what he did to his room, and Kevin runs away.
